clauses.title: Work Description
clauses.body: The Contractor agrees to perform the following handyman/trade services for the Client: [service_or_property]. This includes [specific tasks] at [location]. The work will be performed during normal business hours unless otherwise agreed. Additional work requires written change orders.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.body: The Client shall pay £[fee] for the services as follows: [payment schedule—e.g., deposit, progress payments, final payment]. Materials are [included/billed separately]. Payment is due within [number] days of invoice. Late payments may incur interest at [percentage]% per month.

clauses.title: Work Standards
clauses.body: The Contractor shall: perform work in a professional manner; obtain necessary permits; comply with building regulations; maintain insurance; and clean up work areas. The Client shall: provide access; make necessary arrangements; and pay for permits if required.

clauses.title: Warranties and Damage
clauses.body: The Contractor warrants workmanship for [number] months from completion. The Contractor is liable for damage caused by their negligence but not for pre-existing conditions or concealed defects discovered during work. The Contractor carries public liability insurance of £[amount].

clauses.title: Completion and Disputes
clauses.body: This agreement terminates upon completion and acceptance of work. Either party may terminate for material breach with [number] days to cure. Disputes shall be referred to mediation before legal action. The Client pays for work completed at termination.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This agreement is governed by the laws of England and Wales.
